name: MBA
author: AFNI Developers
description: Matrix-Based Analysis Program through Bayesian Multilevel Modeling

inputs.description: Specify the number of Markov chains
inputs.name: Chains

inputs.description: Specify the number of iterations per Markov chain
inputs.name: Iterations

inputs.description: Specify the effects associated with explanatory variables
inputs.name: Model

inputs.description: Identify effects of interest in the output
inputs.name: Effects of Interest

inputs.description: Specify the data structure in a table of long format
inputs.name: Data table

inputs.description: Identify comparisons of interest between quantitative variables
inputs.name: Quantitative Comparisons

inputs.description: Identify quantitative variables (or covariates) to be standardized
inputs.name: Standardize Variables

inputs.description: Invoke within-chain parallelization to speed up runtime
inputs.name: Within-Chain Parallelization

inputs.description: Specify the distribution for the response variable
inputs.name: Distribution for Response Variable

inputs.description: Specify the column name that designates the standard error for the response variable
inputs.name: Standard Error

inputs.description: Enable R to save the parameters in a file called .MBA.dbg.AFNI.args for debugging purposes
inputs.name: Debug Arguments

output-files.description: Main output text file storing inference information
output-files.name: Output Text File

output-files.description: R data file for post hoc processing and plotting
output-files.name: Output RData File
